mentions.context: Using the Praat software (Boersma & Weenink, 2019), the Fz signals were segmented offline.

Data processing and visualization were carried out in R (R Core Team, 2019) using a number of specialized libraries, most notably stats (R Core Team, 2019), lme4 (Bates, Maechler, Bolker & Walker, 2015), forcats (Wickham, 2019) and ggplot2 (Wickham, 2016).

Data processing and visualization were carried out in R (R Core Team, 2019) using a number of specialized libraries, most notably stats (R Core Team, 2019), lme4 (Bates, Maechler, Bolker & Walker, 2015), forcats (Wickham, 2019) and ggplot2 (Wickham, 2016).

Data processing and visualization were carried out in R (R Core Team, 2019) using a number of specialized libraries, most notably stats (R Core Team, 2019), lme4 (Bates, Maechler, Bolker & Walker, 2015), forcats (Wickham, 2019) and ggplot2 (Wickham, 2016).
